title: Crystal Cavern Nexus Adventure #100
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Crystal Antechamber
rooms.description: A shimmering chamber carved from living crystal. Veins of luminescent blue and purple crystals pulse with inner light, casting dancing shadows on the walls. The air hums with ancient energy. Crystalline formations jut from the floor and ceiling like frozen lightning. A stone pedestal stands in the center, and a locked crystal cabinet glows against the far wall.

items.name: ancient stone pedestal
items.description: A weathered pedestal with three crystal slots arranged in a triangle pattern
items.text: Inscription carved in ancient script: 'The Nexus was sealed in the year of three crystals and seven stars: 377. Only the Keeper may pass beyond.'

items.name: crystal cabinet
items.description: A cabinet made of translucent crystal with two compartments visible inside

items.name: Keeper's journal
items.description: A book bound in crystallized leather, its pages shimmer with preserved text
items.text: Journal of the Nexus Keeper: I am Keeper Crystallis, guardian of the Nexus Core. The year 377 marks the sealing of this sacred place. The three sacred crystals - Sapphire, Emerald, and Ruby - must be united to access the inner sanctum. The resonance chamber holds secrets for those who listen.

items.name: prismatic key
items.description: A key carved from rainbow crystal that refracts light into countless colors

items.name: jutting crystal formations
items.description: Sharp crystalline spikes growing from the cavern floor

items.name: sapphire crystal shard
items.description: A brilliant blue crystal shard, one of the three sacred crystals

items.name: ornate crystal chest
items.description: A chest made of interlocking crystal plates with a prismatic lock

items.name: emerald crystal shard
items.description: A vibrant green crystal shard, the second of the three sacred crystals

items.name: preserved scroll
items.description: A scroll sealed in a crystal tube, perfectly preserved
items.text: Scroll of the Nexus: To enter the Luminous Gallery, one must know the answers. Where does the Keeper dwell? What powers the ancient machines? Who guards the threshold?

items.name: crystal archway
items.description: An archway carved from solid crystal, leading deeper into the cavern system

rooms.name: Luminous Gallery
rooms.description: A vast gallery where thousands of crystals grow from every surface, creating a forest of light. Each crystal resonates with a different tone, filling the air with harmonic music. Ancient murals are etched into the smooth sections of wall between crystal clusters. A massive door made of interlocking crystal plates blocks the northern passage, and a resonance chamber sits embedded in the eastern wall.

items.name: mural of the Keeper
items.description: An etched mural showing a robed figure standing before the Nexus
items.text: Mural inscription: 'Keeper Crystallis, eternal guardian, dwells within the Nexus Core where all paths converge.'

items.name: mural of power
items.description: An etched mural depicting energy flowing through crystal networks
items.text: Mural inscription: 'The Nexus draws power from the Heart of the Mountain, an eternal wellspring of crystal energy that never fades.'

items.name: mural of the guardian
items.description: An etched mural showing a crystalline sentinel
items.text: Mural inscription: 'The threshold is guarded by the Crystal Sentinel, an ancient construct of living stone and light.'

items.name: resonance chamber
items.description: A hollow in the wall filled with perfectly tuned crystal chimes

items.name: ruby crystal shard
items.description: A deep red crystal shard, the final of the three sacred crystals

items.name: crystal fountain
items.description: A fountain where liquid light flows over crystal formations

items.name: Keeper's message
items.description: A crystallized note left by the ancient Keeper
items.text: Final message: I am Keeper Crystallis. I have sealed myself within the Nexus Core to protect it for eternity. Only one who knows where I dwell, what powers this place, and who guards it may enter. The Crystal Sentinel awaits.

items.name: Nexus Core entrance
items.description: A magnificent door of interlocking crystal plates. Three questions are etched into a crystal panel beside it, glowing with inner light.

password_questions.question: Where does the Keeper dwell?
password_questions.hint: Check the mural of the Keeper in the gallery

password_questions.question: What powers the Nexus?
password_questions.hint: The mural of power explains the energy source

password_questions.question: Who guards the threshold?
password_questions.hint: Read the mural of the guardian carefully

rooms.name: Nexus Core
rooms.description: You have reached the heart of the Crystal Cavern Nexus! A massive chamber where all the crystal veins converge into a single point of brilliant light. In the center, a crystalline throne holds the preserved form of Keeper Crystallis, transformed into living crystal. Three pedestals surround the throne, each with a socket for a sacred crystal. Above, a portal of pure light swirls, showing glimpses of the world beyond. The Crystal Sentinel, a towering construct of animated crystal, stands guard but does not move - it recognizes you as worthy.

items.name: crystalline throne
items.description: A throne of pure crystal where Keeper Crystallis sits in eternal vigil, transformed into a living statue of light

items.name: three sacred pedestals
items.description: Three pedestals arranged in a triangle, each with a socket for one of the sacred crystal shards
items.text: Inscription on the pedestals: 'Unite the three sacred crystals - Sapphire, Emerald, and Ruby - to activate the portal and complete your journey.'

items.name: Crystal Sentinel
items.description: A massive construct of animated crystal and stone, standing motionless in recognition of your worthiness

items.name: portal of light
items.description: A swirling vortex of pure radiant energy that leads to freedom. It requires all three sacred crystals to fully activate.

rooms.name: Crystal Gateway
rooms.description: You emerge from the portal into a beautiful crystal garden bathed in natural sunlight. The caverns are behind you, and ahead lies a path leading back to the surface world. The three sacred crystals in your possession glow warmly, a gift from the ancient Nexus.

items.name: crystal garden
items.description: A magnificent garden where crystals grow naturally in the sunlight, creating rainbows everywhere

items.name: path to surface
items.description: A clear path leading upward to the world above

rooms.win_message: You have successfully navigated the Crystal Cavern Nexus and united the three sacred crystals! The ancient Keeper Crystallis's spirit appears briefly in the light, nodding in approval before fading away. The portal has granted you safe passage, and you emerge with the sacred crystals as proof of your worthy journey. The Nexus Core is at peace, and you are free. You win!
